dateplot1.title: Ch1: CH4
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) FROM gasmonitor_ch01 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
dateplot1.ylabel: Gas level / % of low explosion level

dateplot2.title: Ch2: CH4
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) FROM gasmonitor_ch02 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
dateplot2.ylabel: Gas level / % of low explosion level
